SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into dlt (code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content, type1_num, type1_money, type2_num, type2_money, type3_num, type3_money, lottery_date,lottery_timestamp,seq) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{r2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{r3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{r4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{r5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{b1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{b2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sales,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poolmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type1Num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type1Money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type2Num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type2Money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type3Num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type3Money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lotteryDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{lotteryTimestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update dlt set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, r1 = #{r1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, r2 = #{r2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, r3 = #{r3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, r4 = #{r4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, r5 = #{r5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b1 = #{b1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, b2 = #{b2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, poolmoney = #{poolmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type1_num = #{type1Num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type1_money = #{type1Money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type2_num = #{type2Num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type2_money = #{type2Money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type3_num = #{type3Num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type3_money = #{type3Money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lottery_date = #{lotteryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, lottery_timestamp = #{lotteryTimestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content, type1_num, type1_money, type2_num, type2_money, type3_num, type3_money, lottery_date,lottery_timestamp,seq from dlt where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, code, r1, r2, r3, r4, r5, b1, b2, sales, poolmoney, content, type1_num, type1_money, type2_num, type2_money, type3_num, type3_money, lottery_date,lottery_timestamp,seq from dlt

(#{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.r1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.r2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.r3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.r4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.r5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.b1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.b2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sales,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.poolmoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type1Num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.type1Money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.type2Num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.type2Money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.type3Num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.type3Money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.lotteryDate,jdbcType=DATE},#{item.lotteryTimestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.seq,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select count(*) from dlt where r1=#{0} or r2=#{0} or r3=#{0} or r4=#{0} or r5=#{0}
SELECT t.b1 FROM (select COUNT(*) cnt,b1 from dlt group by b1) t ORDER BY t.cnt ${sort}
SELECT t.b2 FROM (select COUNT(*) cnt,b2 from dlt group by b2) t ORDER BY t.cnt ${sort}
select b1 ball,COUNT(*) cnt from dlt group by b1
select count(*) from dlt where r1=#{r1} and r2=#{r2} and r3=#{r3} and r4=#{r4} and r5=#{r5}
select count(*) from dlt where code = #{code}
